EstablishmentCollection.RightToReply:
<p>
	We have been affected by a huge building project on a neighbouring premises, whereby the scaffolders dislodged a ridge tile. This has resulted in rainwater entering our premises and leaving damp patches on the rear of the premises and ceiling. A suitable repair has now been completed alongside other structural improvements being carried out internally. Our commitment is to ensure that we are proactive with all maintenance and repairs. We have taken this as an opportunity to appoint industrial cleaners to help and assist with our ongoing maintenance of high standards.&nbsp;</p>
